Text:
Excellent.  Thanks a ton for this.

Downloaded and installed quickly and flawlessly and I'm playing it now.  Chuzzles make me giggle.  :)

I'll keep seeding this as long as you keep up the great work.
Wow, this is GREAT! thanks a ton, my mum loves this game. xD

HELP please. I keep getting a vitus warning when I try to play this game and other downloads for it from here. Can anyone tell me why? It seems everyone else has had good luck . Also they keep telling me I do not have permission to access the file?
Had to disable themes and such in compatibility to get it to work right for Windows 7. Other than that...fun game. :)
